text:
[Verse]
Sky is getting painted
All those colors fading
Day is saying goodbye now
Night is creeping in

[Verse 2]
Moon is rising slowly
Stars are shining holy
City lights are glowing
In the cool night breeze

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we're chasing
In our hearts embracing
Every moment racing
With the colors of the sky

[Verse 3]
Walk the quiet shoreline
Feel the waves in motion
Whispers of the ocean
Underneath the moon

[Bridge]
Hold on tight to moments
Memories we're owning
Time is always flowing
But tonight is ours

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we're chasing
In our hearts embracing
Every moment racing
With the colors of the sky
title: Sunset Dreams
